welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.subtitle: We want to help you show up consistently on LinkedIn with content that feels like you.
welcome.bottomText: We'll ask a few questions to tailor your strategy.

firstThingsFirst.title: Your LinkedIn
firstThingsFirst.subtitle: Tell us your LinkedIn URL so we can write posts that feel like you.
firstThingsFirst.label: Your LinkedIn Profile
firstThingsFirst.infoText: The more information you provide about yourself, the better the results will be.

errors.invalid: Please enter a valid LinkedIn username or URL

messages.saveSuccess: LinkedIn profile saved! We'll try to collect more details in the background.

linkedInSummary.title: Profile Summary
linkedInSummary.subtitle: Here's what we found on your LinkedIn profile. This information will help us personalize your content strategy.
linkedInSummary.infoText: This information will help us create personalized content that matches your professional background and expertise.

whatsappInput.title: Staying in Touch
whatsappInput.subtitle: Tell us how we can stay in touch
whatsappInput.label: Your WhatsApp number
whatsappInput.utilityText: We'll send messages with drafts and content suggestions based on your Content Plan
whatsappInput.infoText: The more information you provide about yourself, the better the results will be.

messages.invalidNumber: Please enter a valid WhatsApp number
messages.saveError: Failed to save WhatsApp number. Please try again.

pacing.title: Your Pace
pacing.subtitle: Tell us how often you want us to maintain your pace
pacing.frequencySubtitle: Set when you want to post
pacing.infoText: The more information you provide about yourself, the better the results will be.

messages.selectDay: Please select at least one day of the week
messages.saveError: Failed to save preferences. Please try again.

goals.title: Your Goals
goals.subtitle: Tell us what your goals are and the target audiences you want to reach
goals.infoText: The more information you provide about yourself, the better the results will be.

messages.saveError: Failed to save goals. Please try again.

pillars.title: Your Pillars
pillars.subtitle: Tell us what types of content and themes you want to address
pillars.contentTypesQuestion: Content types you want to create
pillars.themesQuestion: Themes you want to talk about
pillars.infoText: The more information you provide about yourself, the better the results will be.

messages.saveError: Failed to save content pillars. Please try again.

format.title: Your Writing Format
format.subtitle: Tell us what writing format you prefer for your LinkedIn posts
format.infoText: The more information you provide about yourself, the better the results will be.

messages.saveError: Failed to save format. Please try again.

knowledge.title: Your Knowledge
knowledge.subtitle: Add books, meeting transcripts or videos, URLs or any material that can create deeper knowledge about your work and the things you want to say.
knowledge.infoText: The more information you provide about yourself, the better the results will be.
